name: What A Legend
storyline: The story is about a young man that goes to the biggest city of the realm to lose his virginity, but ends up meeting a mysterious woman who sends him on an epic quest. A quest full of sexual encounters, unhappy housewives, beautiful damsels, comely magical creatures, and the chance to become a legend.​
summary: What A Legend is a hand-drawn sandbox adult visual novel with 2D animations and a large cast of female characters to seduce and romance. You play as a young man who has a special gift that might be the key to save the kingdom from its corrupt leaders.
